Class PictureWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.webapp.gallery.rest.PictureWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<Picture>

    @Provider
@Produces("application/json")
public class PictureWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<Picture>
    This class is used as a converter of Picture's to JSON format.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic
